title: OOL Teams and Results.

embed.description: Oceanic Open Ladder as run for Riot Games Oceania! This is your Path to Pro as an aspirational player, the OOL is your direct route to the Challenger Series and as such, the Oceanic Pro Leagues

body:
Ok, so I have been looking at the OOL results. 

 Results from Split 1 -  2017

Week 1 there were 55 teams --->Winner - Abbyss Academy. runner-up - Invoked. 3rd - Equinox Dusk. 4th - Avant Garde Academy.

Week 2 there were 73 teams --->Winner - Equinox Dawn.  runner-up - Team Reticent. 3rd - Abbyss Academy. 4th - ForTheRP.

Week 3 there were 65 teams --->Winner - Equinox Dawn. runner-up - Abbyss Academy. 3rd - Crimson. 4th - No Love.


this weeks registration is still open. Follow the link above to register a team.
